title: Oct. 15: Girls tennis roundup
text: Posted Oct. 16, 2015 at 2:00 AM Posted Oct. 16, 2015 at 2:00 AM » Social News OCIAA championship Defending champion Sera Satkowski rolled to the Orange County Interscholastic Athletic Association semifinals with a 6-0, 6-2 win over Cornwall's Taylor Maddalena 6-0, 6-2 at Match Point Tennis in Goshen. Satkowski, a Valley Central junior and the top seed, will play Washingtonville seventh-grader Jalynn Balleste, the fifth seed, for the third time this season in a semifinal. Satkowski has won the first two matches. Goshen eighth-grader Jane Bockman, the second seed, plays Pine Bush senior Sara Bogdanovic in the other semifinal. Semifinals for singles and doubles begin at 9 a.m. Friday at Match Point. Bockman defeated Monroe-Woodbury’s Madeline Salino 6-0, 6-0 in quarterfinal action. Singles Quarterfinals: Sera Satkowski (Valley Central) d. Taylor Maddalena (Cornwall) 6-0, 6-2; Jalynn Balleste (Washingtonville) d. Jordan Drapkin (Monticello) 6-0, 6-0; Sara Bogdanovic (Pine Bush) d. Hanna Scali (James I. O'Neill) 7-5, 6-0; Jane Bockman (Goshen) d. Madeline Salino (Monroe-Woodbury) 6-0, 6-0. Round of 16: Taylor Maddalena (Cornwall) d. Kelsey Reivers (Goshen) 6-7 (7-4), 7-5, 10-8; Jalynn Balleste (Washingtonville) d. Kortney McHale (Valley Central) 6-3, 6-2; Jordan Drapkin (Monticello) d. Elizabeth Sirico (Minisink Valley) 7-6 (7-4); Sara Bogdanovic (Pine Bush) d. Emily Edwards (Monticello) 6-1, 6-0; Hanna Scali (James I. O'Neill) d. Sophia Shurlati (James I. O'Neill) 6-2, 6-3; Madeline Salino (Monroe-Woodbury) d. Anna Hendrickson (Fallsburg/Tri-Valley) 6-1, 6-1. Round of 32: Kelsey Reivers (Goshen) d. Patricia Whelan (John S. Burke Catholic) 6-3, 2-6, 10-5; Kortney McHale (Valley Central) d. Sarah Movas (Goshen) 6-3, 6-1; Emily Edwards (Monticello) d. Sydney Sauschuck (Port Jervis) 6-2, 6-0; Sophia Shurlati (James I. O'Neill) d. Miyanna Vernon (Liberty) 6-2, 6-0; Madeline Salino (Monroe-Woodbury) d. Raquelle DeCicco (Kingston) 6-4, 6-3. recordonline.com
